tweet_text:
@veniteo It is impractical. But it also helps to remind us that we should never accept our beliefs (or knowledge) as truth.  Truth is unknowable, but we can act on the best guesses.

This is how you fight people deserving like they are superior to others.  You undermine their "truth".

tweet_text: @cllrmikeross @wilson_cllr I was a child in 70s Britain, but I was in Zimbabwe in the 2000s. It got crazy very quickly. People's nest eggs and final salary pensions became worthless. Going shopping with a huge bag of cash looked like a heist movie.
